examples.Question: Extract all bold texts. Print those raw texts separated by \n.
examples.Reference:
i
nob banana idiot zen *essence*[[wi.png]]salvage nob
* j
oops banana idiot zen salvage nob

RuleHint: To find the bold texts, search for single star, i.e., *, the content between two occurrences of single star is the bold texts. Note that the bold range should start from the single star occurring at i-th spot throughout the whole input file, where i is odd, and end with single star occurring at jth spot where j is even. For example, text between single star appearing first and second time.
